content: As you reach the peak of the mountain, you'll see a black dog. It will run toward the building at the top of the peak and soon join Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, who you fought at the very beginning of the game. This time, however, it's a bigger challenge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
As you reach the peak of the mountain, you'll see a black dog. It will run toward the building at the top of the peak and soon join Erlang, The Sacred Divinity, who you fought at the very beginning of the game. This time, however, it's a bigger challenge.
